metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23481 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: xrdp is an open source project which provides a graphical login to remote machines using Microsoft Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). xrdp < v0.9.21 contain a Out of Bound Read in xrdp_caps_process_confirm_active() function. There are no known workarounds for this issue. Users are advised to upgrade.

criterions.comment: xrdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
